product_name: REI Classic Duffel Bag - Large - Special Buy
long_description: Our large REI Classic Duffel Bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use. Urethane-coated 1,000-denier nylon is highly water resistant and very tough; dual zippers facilitate easy access to main compartment. Wrap-around 2 in. nylon webbing handles support the load. Convenient storage sack doubles as a toiletry bag. Tote the large REI Classic Duffel Bag comfortably with the included adjustable shoulder strap. Special buy.
short_description: Our large REI Classic Duffel Bag offers 4,600 cu. in. of space and comes in a convenient storage pouch for simple storage and transport when not in use.
